title: Authentic Taste!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Thank you, Lanzhu-chan~. Kanata has always wanted to try an authentic dim sum!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s nothing. Just let me know, and Lanzhu can arrange one for you whenever.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The flavor is so complex, isn’t it.... Kanata doesn’t think Kanata can reproduce it just by eating it once.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Well, then you can just have one tomorrow, the next day, and the day after that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>No, Kanata wants to.... make it myself! Kanata has a burning desire to make one~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Aaaah.... It’s nice to see you so determined like this too, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hey, Lanzhu-chan. Since Kanata wants to try my hand at making one, will you taste it for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eeeeh!? Lanzhu can have a taste of your dim sum!? Sure, yeah, of course Lanzhu wants to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, since you’re used to eating the real thing, Kanata is a bit nervous about having you try mine, Lanzhu-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu is also confident in my tasting abilities! Lanzhu will go along with you until you can make a satisfactory dim sum!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
